title: Decoded Quantum Interferometry (DQI) for MaxCut
subtitle: Solving the MaxCut Problem using the DQI Algorithm in the setting of max-XORSAT
description: This notebook relates to the paper "Optimization by Decoded Quantum Interferometry" (DQI) , which introduces a quantum algorithm for combinatorial optimization problems. The algorithm focuses on finding approximate solutions to the *max-LINSAT* problem, and takes advantage of the sparse Fourier spectrum of certain optimization functions.
